# This is a CMake initial cache file, generated by cmake-freeze.
# Use:
#  mkdir BUILD
#  cd BUILD
#  ccmake -C <path/to/thisfile>  ..
# Note: -C works only if BUILD/CMakeCache.txt doesn't exist.
#
# Alternatively you can use cmake-apply which
# also works with an existing CMakeCache.txt.
set(AK_SHM OFF CACHE BOOL "shared memory abstraction")
set(AK_SHM_ADMIN OFF CACHE BOOL "shmadmin")
set(AK_SHM_CV_EXAMPLE OFF CACHE BOOL "examples to show the use of opencv data with akshm")
set(AK_SHM_IMAGEVIEW OFF CACHE BOOL "shmimageview")
set(AK_SHM_MEX 0 CACHE BOOL "shm mex interface")
set(APPS_CALIBSTEREO OFF CACHE BOOL "Add description here.")
set(APPS_CAMCALIB OFF CACHE BOOL "Add description here.")

set(APPS_TESTSTRACKER 0 CACHE BOOL "Add description here.")
set(ENABLE_FTGL_FONTS 0 CACHE BOOL "Enable ftgl fonts do draw OpenGL fonts?")
